name: The Final Ollie
description:
Hello!

Welcome to the Alpha build of my little hobby side project. The idea was born in a kitchen during coffee break I had with Kimiko, and we decided to try making it into an actual game. First version was created in a weekend, we were pretty happy with what we got, we gave it to some friends, and we decided that experiment was a success and we can move on. Few months and few game jams later I found myself still going back to that rough prototype, until finally I decided to try making something a little big bigger from it. 

Few months later still, and here we are :D

This was my goal from the start, a more polished version with 25 levels that I'll be able to show around, and see if it's worth putting a year or so more, to get into final final version (I target around 80 levels split into 4 "worlds", this version is basically tutorial and first world). If it turns out me and Kimiko are not the only ones thinking this game has potential, I will begin further development, probably in much more opened way too. 

TL;DR hobby project, Alpha version, if (good) {will make more}

Best played on mobile or PC with downloaded version, since Gamemaker can be weird on HTML and I cant promise best experience this way :<

EDIT:

Yeah HTML version was falling apart, so I deleted it for now

GAME:

  • You can jump ONCE
  • Collect energy drink to refill jumps
  • Collect cassettes to prove that You're RAD :D

CONTROLS:

  • tap button to jump
  • swipe button left to restart level
  • swipe button right to go to next level when You get to the goal

Have fun, and let me know what You think in a comment, I will be forever grateful for any feedback, good or bad! Skate on!
